page.title: 08BEWBUSH SURVEY _ SERVICES
page.content:
{More questions about life in Bewbush.
Do you like living in Bewbush? yes:62% Are local shops adequate? yes:30% Is public transport good? yes:52% Is public transport poor? yes:12% Do you shop in town regularly? yes:33% Do you shop elsewhere? yes:30% Travel to town _by bus yes:17% by car yes:34% by bus or car yes:14% by bus or walk yes:31% by moped/bike yes: 3% Do you use your Leisure Centre?yes:38%
{What extra facilities are needed? swimming pool yes:31% more shops, parking garages yes:21% more activities e.g. library yes: 7% more open space/lower density yes: 3% Others mentioned were: a church, more playgroups, a dog warden.
